articles.author: Waheed Abbas
articles.title: Indian rupee slips against UAE dirham - Khaleej Times
articles.description: Traders said declining crude oil prices, firm Asian currencies and positive sentiment in the Indian equity market, however, capped the fall in the currency
articles.content:
Traders said declining crude oil prices, firm Asian currencies and positive sentiment in the Indian equity market, however, capped the fall in the currency

articles.author: Sumathi Bala
articles.title: IMF is bullish Sri Lanka's crisis-stricken economy will recover as country gets bailout - CNBC
articles.description: The South Asian country is grappling with its worst financial crisis in decades and the IMF's decision will allow an immediate disbursement of a $333 million loan over four years.
articles.content: A man waves Sri Lanka's national flag after climbing a tower near presidential secretariat in Colombo on July 11, 2022, after it was overrun by anti-government protestors. (Photo by ARUN SANKAR/AFP v… [+5038 chars]
